text:
The Galaxy Buds update themselves by focusing on stability (photo)
06 Nov 2019, 18:46 by Matteo Bottin
News for Samsung's Galaxy Buds: a new firmware is being rollout, which weighs very little and aims at increasing the stability of the Bluetooth connection, a bit like the one released in August.
The new version comes with the code R170XXU0ASJ2 and weighs just 1.38 MB. In short, a very marginal update, but with it brings some fixes to some bugs related to Bluetooth connectivity. Sammobile confirms the increased stability of Samsung's true wireless headphones.
Not that the Galaxy Buds were poor, in fact: in our review they behaved very well, and since then they have received some updates that should have improved.



1 ðŸ“· go to the photo gallery


Via: Apple Watch
